name: fluix
description: Physics-based, cross-framework UI components. Beautiful by default.

scripts.build: pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:css && pnpm --filter "./packages/*" run build
scripts.demo: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter demo run dev
scripts.demo:svelte: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter demo-svelte run dev
scripts.demo:vanilla: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter demo-vanilla run dev
